column2:
"That was epic, <%me>!
I watched the whole thing on the monitor!"
"Oh, right, I already said that. But I really meant it, so don't be surprised if I keep repeating myself."
"I totally dug how you handled that. You really know how to get the job done."

"I feel like I could do it too now...!
Heh, I can't let you have all the cool moments for yourself, killer!"
